channel.title: I Keep getting an error message with all Appliences
channel.description:
Hello so I have Whinow for a while now noproblems. Then all of a sudden i get a message that says " VMMR0_DO_NEM_INIT_VM failed: VERR_NEM_MISSING_KERNEL_API_2 (VERR_NEM_MISSING_KERNEL_API_2).
VT-x is not available (VERR_VMX_NO_VMX).
|Result Code:|E_FAIL (0x80004005)| | --- | --- | |Component:|ConsoleWrap| |Interface:|IConsole {872da645-4a9b-1727-bee2-5585105b9eed}|" Even after re installing downloading diffrent versions I still get this message. Any help??

item.title: I Keep getting an error message with all Appliences
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
VirtualBox issue. Not Whonix issue.

Therefore as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle you can ask in VirtualBox forums. Use search engines first. You’re not the first and the last to have this issue.

Might be this one:
https://forums.virtualbox.org/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=96201

Read full topic
item.source: I Keep getting an error message with all Appliences

item.title: I Keep getting an error message with all Appliences
item.dc:creator: nodeguy
item.description:
The forum here won’t let me post links, but the suggested solution is to uninstall VirtualBox, delete any leftover files and registry entries, then reinstall VirtualBox.

Read full topic
item.source: I Keep getting an error message with all Appliences

item.title: I Keep getting an error message with all Appliences
item.dc:creator: BOssmank
item.description:
Hello so I have Whinow for a while now noproblems. Then all of a sudden i get a message that says " VMMR0_DO_NEM_INIT_VM failed: VERR_NEM_MISSING_KERNEL_API_2 (VERR_NEM_MISSING_KERNEL_API_2).

VT-x is not available (VERR_VMX_NO_VMX).

Result Code: E_FAIL (0x80004005)
Component: ConsoleWrap
Interface: IConsole {872da645-4a9b-1727-bee2-5585105b9eed}

Even after re installing downloading diffrent versions I still get this message. Any help??

Read full topic
